includedAssets.title: You're Gonna Love Tomorrow

includedAssets.synopsis: The action picks up five years on, as Edie returns to Wisteria Lane with her new husband.

includedAssets.altTitle: S5, Ep4 - Back In Business

includedAssets.altTitle: S5, Ep5 - Mirror, Mirror

includedAssets.altTitle: S5, Ep14 - Mama Spent Money When She Had None

includedAssets.title: Season 5
includedAssets.synopsis: The story of Wisteria Lane jumps forward five years, as Edie returns with a new husband. Fifth season of the smash-hit drama series starring Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross and Eva Longoria.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The story jumps forward five years, as Edie returns with a new husband.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The story of Wisteria Lane jumps forward five years, as Edie returns with a new husband. Fifth season of the smash-hit drama series starring Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross and Eva Longoria.

includedIn.title: Desperate Housewives
includedIn.synopsis: Four suburban housewives find their lives taking a shocking turn when their friend and neighbour unexpectedly commits suicide. But her tragic death turns out to be just the start of a string of shadowy and salacious goings-on on Wisteria Lane.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Four housewives' lives are devastated when their friend commits suicide, but that's just the start of a string of shocking events on Wisteria Lane.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Four suburban housewives find their lives taking a shocking turn when their friend and neighbour unexpectedly commits suicide. But her tragic death turns out to be just the start of a string of shadowy and salacious goings-on on Wisteria Lane.
